alert.note: Alert for Delta; Fannin; Hopkins; Hunt; Lamar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 5:19AM CDT until March 30 at 6:15AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Hunt County in north central Texas... Northwestern Hopkins County in north central Texas... Lamar County in north central Texas... Delta County in north central Texas... Southeastern Fannin County in north central Texas... * Until 615 AM CDT. * At 518 AM CDT, a line of severe thunderstorms was located from Honey Grove to Commerce, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Paris, Commerce, Cooper, Honey Grove, Blossom, Cumby, Campbell, Deport, Cooper Lake Park South Sulphur, Cooper Lake Park Doctors Creek, Roxton, Ladonia, Tira, Pecan Gap, Toco and Sun Valley. This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 103 and 112. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for north central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
